his uniform, his chest ex- panded and his back drawn in, slightly swing- 
ing one foot, and, with his head a little bent, looked with beaming face at the princess with- out speaking and evidently not thinking about her at all. Anatole was not quick-witted, nor ready or eloquent in conversation, but he had the faculty, so invaluable in society, of compo- sure and imperturbable self-possession.
